# LinearPCMFormatFlagIsFloat

**Enumeration Case**

A flag to indicate whether PCM samples are floating-point values.

## Declaration

```swift
LinearPCMFormatFlagIsFloat
```

## Discussion

This flag is a synonym of [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioFormatFlags/FormatFlagIsFloat].

## Numeric Representation Flags

- **FormatFlagIsFloat**: A flag to indicate whether samples are floating-point values.
- **FormatFlagIsSignedInteger**: A flag to indicate whether samples are signed or unsigned integers.
- **LinearPCMFormatFlagIsSignedInteger**: A flag to indicate whether PCM samples are signed or unsigned integers.
